description: Jan Hein Hoogstad, known as Yeehaa, is a skilled professional renowned for his expertise. He authored articles such as 'Align the Misaligned' and 'Continental Drift,' focusing on internet fragmentation and innovative design practices. He promotes decentralized and regenerative systems inspired by Wabi-sabi and Kintsugi. Explore his insights and extensive experience on LinkedIn.
